name: Laser Defender (Marc T.)
description:
How to Play:

Use the Arrow keys to move around the screen

Press and or hold space to fire

Laser Defender:

Laser Defender is a simple top down 2d shoot 'em up with a more traditional arcade style. In the game you have a set number of lives and each time you die you loose one. You can get more lives by picking up the green power up which occasionally drops from enemies. There are also full-heal (Blue) and weapon (Red) power ups which you might find while you play.

Dev Note:

I have been holding onto this game for sometime and only recently realized I have had a work in progress page for it recently. So I decided to finish it up and upload the game now that I have some free time.
